price: "Kõ kuma wata gõna daga dabĩnai da inabi ta kasance a gare ka. Sa'an nan ka ɓuɓɓugar da ƙõramu a tsakãninta ɓuɓɓugarwa."
arabic: أَوۡ تَكُونَ لَكَ جَنَّةٞ مِّن نَّخِيلٖ وَعِنَبٖ فَتُفَجِّرَ ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرَ خِلَٰلَهَا تَفۡجِيرًا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: aw takūna laka jannatun min nakhīlin waʿinabin fatufajjira al-anhāra khilālahā tafjīran
